member.name: M:IntegralCardAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: A simple helper class for build SQL statements

member.name: M:IntegralCardAPI.Common.SqlParamHelper.#ctor(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Construct an SQL statement with the supplied SQL and arguments
member.param: Arguments to any parameters embedded in the SQL

member.summary: Append another SQL builder instance to the right-hand-side of this SQL builder
member.param: A reference to another SQL builder instance
member.returns: A reference to this builder, allowing for fluent style concatenation

member.name: M:IntegralCardAPI.Common.SqlParamHelper.Append(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Append an SQL fragement to the right-hand-side of this SQL builder
member.param: Arguments to any parameters embedded in the SQL
member.returns: A reference to this builder, allowing for fluent style concatenation

member.summary: Appends an SQL WHERE clause to this SQL builder

Arguments to any parameters embedded in the supplied SQL
member.returns: A reference to this builder, allowing for fluent style concatenation

member.returns: A reference to this builder, allowing for fluent style concatenation

member.name: P:IntegralCardAPI.Common.SqlParamHelper.Builder

member.summary: Returns the final SQL statement represented by this builder
